caption.title: Correlation of LPS and CTB-specific antibody responses in DBS eluates and plasma in cholera patients.
caption.p: Spearman correlation of LPS-specific IgA (A), IgG (B), IgM (C), and CTB-specific IgA (D), IgG (E) and IgM (F) antibody responses between DBS eluates and plasma of cholera patients at day 7 are shown.
Click here for additional data file.
